definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: This is because connections are vulnerable to breaking due to the flexible screen.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为由于柔性荧光屏易碎致使连接脆弱。

sentences.english: They fear (and not that unreasonably) that this would give the debtor states less incentive to reform.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有缘由地害怕这会致使借贷国家不思改革。

sentences.english: Chapter 5: Typological analysis of the generating mechanism of the causative structure in Korean and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 第五章朝汉致使范畴形成机制的类型学分析。

sentences.english: Egypt Strike Fizzles Amid Tight Security.
sentences.chinese: 埃及罢工失败致使局势紧张。

sentences.english: Political corruption, questions and so on famine relief measures difficult line.
sentences.chinese: 政治腐败，致使荒政难以施行等问题。

sentences.english: As for illegals, it would simply drive even more of them underground.
sentences.chinese: 至于那些非法者，这将会致使他们更多的人转向地下。

sentences.english: Her unstable mind was what made her so vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 她不安靖的意识致使她是如斯的亏弱虚弱。

sentences.english: It is still not clear if the cola or the unhealthy lifestyle, or both, is to blame.
sentences.chinese: 现在仍不清楚致使精子数减少的诱因是什么？

sentences.english: The pusher, not qualified products to sell fish in troubled waters.
sentences.chinese: 致使不法商贩浑水摸鱼，出售不合格产品。

sentences.english: Lactea are compact which is one reason lead to the low germination percent of seeds.
sentences.chinese: 种皮厚而致密，也是致使种子发芽率低的原因之一。

sentences.english: Oesophagitis is inflammation of the inner lining of the oesophagus caused by repeated episodes of gastro-oesophageal reflux.
sentences.chinese: 胃食管反复逆流致使食道内部上火，从而导致食管炎。

sentences.english: The rotary piston tends to be damaged because much dust contented in the raw materials contaminates the pump oil.
sentences.chinese: 但因原材料的灰份多，泵油很容易污染，致使泵卡死。

sentences.english: Variation of the screw angle results in reduction of purchase of the locking interface, or cross-threading the head.
sentences.chinese: 螺钉角度的变异会致使锁定界面的减少或跨螺纹的头。

sentences.english: Errors are easily made that prevent the trial balance from balancing.
sentences.chinese: 致使试算表不平衡的错误是很容易犯的。

sentences.english: As ketones is acidic substances, which occur in vivo metabolic acidosis.
sentences.chinese: 由于酮体是酸性物质，致使体内发生代谢性酸中毒。

sentences.english: Heavy rain and lightning, resulting in Chongqing Jiangbei International Airport flight delays.
sentences.chinese: 暴雨和闪电，致使重庆江北国际机场航班出现延误。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
